Package BusinessLayer

package BusinessLayer
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    IDeliveryServiceProcessing
    This interface defines the operations that can be performed by the administrator and the client
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    BaseProducts
    This class implements operations performed on a composite product
    CompositeProduct
    This class implements operations performed on a composite product
    DeliveryService
    This class implements the functionalities of the management system
    IdPassword
    This class will save the userId and password pairs
    MenuItem
    In this class, the data corresponding the products will be saved and the operations for products will be implemented
    Observable
    This abstract class defines the methods that will link employees to the status of orders
    Order
    In this class, the data corresponding to an order will be saved and the operations for orders will be implemented
    Users
    This class will store data for each type of user
